9d563706-b026-44ba-b7b4-abfa097e2f4a.name: 健康
9d563706-b026-44ba-b7b4-abfa097e2f4a.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

b4e99712-69ca-4253-8862-f9f5ba08c085.name: Fit, Very
b4e99712-69ca-4253-8862-f9f5ba08c085.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

4f783aeb-bbef-4fae-9ca0-c66d6b619f3b.name: 高痛阈
4f783aeb-bbef-4fae-9ca0-c66d6b619f3b.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

1fbb2d3d-acc3-443e-b5cb-c74dbdd961d9.name: Shield-Wall Training
1fbb2d3d-acc3-443e-b5cb-c74dbdd961d9.notes: You may block attacks on an ally beside you and ignore attack penalty for large shields

171b9f6a-3e0e-4ecd-94db-d758c02275ce.name: Weapon Bond
171b9f6a-3e0e-4ecd-94db-d758c02275ce.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

731e950b-8b2e-42c6-8513-59c28fe36c5c.name: 社会污名（少数群体）
731e950b-8b2e-42c6-8513-59c28fe36c5c.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group

09850a3b-e551-48c1-b582-22045c80a5d6.name: Or any 1 point in any other class skill
